title: MCP Dual-Source Configuration Guidance for AI Assistants
body: MCP DUAL-SOURCE SETUP: Configure AI assistants (Copilot, GPT-5, Claude) with TWO MCP instruction sources in priority order: PRIMARY (Priority 0): This repository's MCP Index Server (mcp-index-server) - contains authoritative project context, development practices, schema specifications, testing strategies, and repository governance. SECONDARY (Priority 1): Microsoft Index Server MCP - provides broader ecosystem patterns, general best practices, and supplementary context. CONFIGURATION DETAILS: 1) Local MCP server runs from this repo using 'npm start' or VS Code MCP integration; 2) MS Index Server configured as additional resource with lower precedence; 3) Conflict resolution favors local instructions by ID matching; 4) External instructions tagged with 'source:external' category; 5) Local instructions remain untagged or tagged 'source:local'. BENEFITS: Combines project-specific accuracy with ecosystem breadth, maintains local authority while gaining external context, enables instruction source transparency through provenance tracking.
rationale: Provides clear configuration guidance for dual-source MCP setups, ensures optimal balance between local authority and external context, and maintains instruction source clarity.
